abstract: Series of text messages revealed in affidavit during arraignment of Kyle Navin in Bridgeport, Conn, may offer clues to disappearance of his parents Jeffrey and Jeanette at beginning of August; Navin was arrested on unrelated charges of possession of firearms and drugs; his parents disappearance has shocked community in town of Easton, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey and Jeanette Navin of Easton, Conn., vanished in early August after Mr. Navin traded a series of strange messages with his son, who has since been arrested on unrelated charges.

headline.main: Before Couple Disappeared, a Troubling Text Exchange: ‘Did You Hurt Mom?’
headline.print_headline: Troubling Text Before a Couple Vanished in Connecticut: ‘Did You Hurt Mom?’

snippet: Jeffrey and Jeanette Navin of Easton, Conn., vanished in early August after Mr. Navin traded a series of strange messages with his son, who has since been arrested on unrelated charges.
